_comment: customized copy of original portainer template file

templates.title: Vaultwarden
templates.description: Alternative implementation of the Bitwarden server API
templates.note: INSTANCE must be unique on every Portainer Node!, please refer to Vaultwarden WIKI for further configuration (repo: Docker Hub).

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID
env.description: Container Instance Name (used for Hostname and Volume binding)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Image Version
env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/r/vaultwarden/server)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Vault URL
env.description: the URL for this Instance (https://xxxxx)

env.name: HIBP_TOKEN
env.label: HIBP Token
env.description: Token for Have i been Pawned API

env.name: DOMAINLIST
env.label: Domain Whitelist
env.description: List of Domains to allow Sign Up

env.name: USERLIST
env.label: Organization Creators
env.description: List of Users to allow Organization creation

env.name: ADMIN_TOKEN
env.label: Admin Token
env.description: Token for Vaultwarden Admin Interface. ONLY ACCESIBLE VIA TRUSTED IPS

env.name: O365_USERNAME
env.label: 365 User
env.description: Office 365 Username for SMTP (typicaly the email address)

env.name: O365_PASSWORD
env.label: 365 Password
env.description: Office 365 Password for SMTP

templates.title: Proxy Manager
templates.description: NGINX Proxy Manager. ALREADY INCLUDED IN NODE SETUP!
templates.note: INSTANCE must be unique on every Portainer Node!, please refer to NGINX Proxy Manager documentation for further configuration (repo: Docker Hub).

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID
env.description: Container Instance Name (used for Hostname and Volume binding)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Image Version
env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/r/jc21/nginx-proxy-manager)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: DISABLE_IPV6
env.label: IPv6
env.description: NGINX IPv6 Support

templates.title: Zabbix Agent
templates.description: Zabbix is the ultimate enterprise-level software designed for real-time monitoring of millions of metrics collected from tens of thousands of servers, virtual machines and network devices. ALREADY INCLUDED IN NODE SETUP!
templates.note: INSTANCE must be unique on every Portainer Node!, please refer to Zabbix documentation for further configuration (repo: Docker Hub).

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID
env.description: Container Instance Name (used for Hostname and Volume binding)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Image Version
env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/r/zabbix/zabbix-agent2)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname
env.description: Hostname for this Agent in Zabbix Server (typicaly the IP)

env.name: SERVER
env.label: Server
env.description: Zabbix Server IP

templates.note: INSTANCE must be unique on every Portainer Node!, please refer to Zabbix documentation for further configuration (repo: Docker Hub).

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID

env.name: VERSION

env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/r/zabbix/zabbix-agent)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname
env.description: Hostname for this Agent in Zabbix Server (typicaly the IP)

env.name: SERVER
env.label: Server
env.description: Zabbix Server IP

templates.title: Zabbix Proxy
templates.description: Zabbix is the ultimate enterprise-level software designed for real-time monitoring of millions of metrics collected from tens of thousands of servers, virtual machines and network devices. ALREADY INCLUDED IN NODE SETUP!
templates.note: INSTANCE must be unique on every Portainer Node!, please refer to Zabbix documentation for further configuration (repo: Docker Hub).

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID
env.description: Container Instance Name (used for Hostname and Volume binding)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Image Version
env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/r/zabbix/zabbix-proxy-sqlite3)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: PROXYMODE
env.label: Proxy Mode
env.description: Passiv (Server connects to proxy) / Active (Proxy connects to server)

env.name: MODULES
env.label: Modules
env.description: The variable is list of comma separated loadable Zabbix modules

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname
env.description: Hostname for this agent in zabbix server (typicaly the IP)

env.name: SERVER
env.label: Server
env.description: Zabbix server IP

templates.title: SQL Server
templates.note:
With the deployment of this Stack you accepts the The Microsoft SQL Server End-User License Agreement (EULA)! Password needs to include at least 8 characters including uppercase, lowercase letters, base-10 digits and/or non-alphanumeric symbols (repo: Docker Hub).
  • DO NOT USE THE DEFAULT PASSWORD!
  • DO NOT USE ON PUBLIC NODES!

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Instance ID
env.description: Container Instance Name (used for Hostname and Volume binding)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Image Version
env.description: Repository Version (see: https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server)

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Container Restart
env.description: Docker Container Restart Behaviour

env.name: MSSQL_PORT
env.label: Port
env.description: SQL Server listening Port

env.name: MSSQL_PID
env.label: Edition (PID)
env.description: Product ID (PID) or Edition that the container will run with
